name: Usable Tumblr
description: Trying to do what Tumblr staff is apparently incapable of doing, by giving a higher contrast but lower saturated dashboard.
additional_info:
Version 1: Changes all the dark blues and neon blues, changes the text to a very dark grey, changes a few main dashboard icon colours.
Version 1.1: Desaturated the blues, green and black further. Added pop-ups on the Settings page. Made the white text on the right side bar a light grey.
Version 1.2: Continuing to pick off a few more missed blues and greens. Made the white text on other screens a light grey as well.
